settings.mindful_box_subtitle: A PERSONAL MENTOR DESIGNED WITH CARE TO GUIDE YOU ON YOUR SPIRITUAL JOURNEY
settings.mindful_box_content: Inconsistency, poor time management, disorganization, negative vibes around. We bet these problems sound familiar to you. Thatâ€™s why our magic box is always there to help! Find your unique way of self-expression, enhance your meditation practice, achieve the desired happiness, and make your first step towards SELF-LOVE!
settings.mindful_box_bottom_line: BECAUSE TO REALLY LOVE OTHERS, YOU FIRST NEED TO LOVE YOURSELF!
settings.show_alt_purpose_text: The feelings of purpose and fulfillment are as important for us as they are for you! Therefore, 5% of Mindful Box sales profits are donated to child protection & care charities.
settings.achieve_harmony_title: ACHIEVE HARMONY IN YOUR LIFE WHILE ALSO CONTRIBUTING TO A BETTER WORLD AROUND!
settings.alt_inside_box_text: Every box will surprise you with a wide variety of unique self-care items!
settings.exceptional_quality_section_text: All the items are ethically sourced by OURSELVES. We find, evaluate, and hand-pick them to ensure the highest quality possible! There is no middleman. As a result, we offer you great value for a reasonable price! All our stones are natural & come from all around the world circles with flags of all countries (India, Brazil, Morocco, US, European)
settings.alt_your_highlight_section_title: YOUR BIGGEST HIGHLIGHT OF THE MONTH
settings.alt_your_highlight_section_text: Each monthâ€™s Mindful Box is a unique surprise! No item is the same!
settings.how_it_works_section_one_text: Click the add to cart button and get ready to receive a package full of wellness goodies every month. Not sure if you want to commit long-term? No worries! With Mindful Souls there are no strings attached! Cancel your subscription ANYTIME for ANY reason.
settings.how_it_works_section_two_text: Once subscribed, there is nothing else to think about! We do all the rest. 6-8 unique items are hand-picked, the box is shipped immediately and delivered within the next 2-5 days right at your doorstep. All the following boxes are sent on the 7th of each month. Shipping is always FREE!
settings.how_it_works_section_three_text: Now, itâ€™s finally time to forget about the rest of the world and focus exclusively on YOU! Enhance your spiritual practices, treat your precious soul, and remember that you deserve nothing but the very best!
settings.how_it_works_section_bottom_line_text: THE PROCESS COULDNâ€™T BE ANY EASIER!

settings.happy_customers_text_two: I love getting my every month! All of these bracelets, rings and necklaces came from Mindful Souls.
settings.happy_customers_text_three: Once I opened the box I was shocked at the quality that was sent to me! I loved each and everything in my first bow so much that I canâ€™t wait for my second
